mapper.select: select * from course a join map b on b.lc_index = a.lc_index

select rownum rn, mp_index, lc_index, m_index, lc_title, lc_type, case when trunc(lc_distance,1)=0 then round(lc_distance,3)*1000||'m' when trunc(lc_distance,0)>0 then round(lc_distance,1)||'km' when trunc(lc_distance,0)=0 then '0'||round(lc_distance,1)||'km' end as lc_distance, lc_run, lc_cycle, lc_area1, lc_area2, lc_area3, lc_thumbnail, lc_text, lc_date, lc_good, lc_see, lc_record, lc_address, lc_xy_arr from ( select rownum rn, mycourse.mp_index,mycourse.lc_index, mycourse.m_index, course.lc_title, course.lc_type, course.lc_distance, course.lc_run, course.lc_cycle, course.lc_area1, course.lc_area2, course.lc_area3, course.lc_thumbnail, course.lc_text, course.lc_date, course.lc_good, course.lc_see, course.lc_record, map.lc_address, map.lc_xy_arr from mycourse, course, map where mycourse.lc_index = course.lc_index and mycourse.lc_index = map.lc_index and mycourse.m_index = #{m_index} )

select rownum rn, pr_index, mycourse.mp_index, pr_title, pr_text, pr_see, pr_good, pr_resistDate, pr_recordDate, pr_record, pr_thumbnail, pr_type, pr_public, course.lc_title, case when trunc(lc_distance,1)=0 then round(lc_distance,3)*1000||'m' when trunc(lc_distance,0)>0 then round(lc_distance,1)||'km' when trunc(lc_distance,0)=0 then '0'||round(lc_distance,1)||'km' end as lc_distance, (lc_area1||' '||lc_area2||' '||lc_area3)as address, mycourse.m_index from mycourse, myrecord, course where mycourse.mp_index = myrecord.mp_index and mycourse.lc_index = course.lc_index and mycourse.m_index = #{m_index} order by rn desc

select rownum rn, pr_index, mycourse.mp_index, pr_title, pr_text, pr_see, pr_good, pr_resistDate, pr_recordDate, PR_RECORD, PR_TYPE, pr_public, LC_TITLE, (round(lc_distance,1)||'km')as LC_DISTANCE, (lc_area1||' '||lc_area2||' '||lc_area3)as ADDRESS, mycourse.m_index from mycourse, myrecord, course where mycourse.mp_index = myrecord.mp_index and mycourse.lc_index = course.lc_index and mycourse.m_index = #{m_index} order by ${searchType} ${sort}

select mr.pr_index,mr.mp_index,mr.m_index,mr.pr_title,mr.pr_text,mr.pr_see,mr.pr_good,mr.pr_resistdate,mr.pr_recorddate,mr.pr_record,mr.pr_thumbnail,mr.pr_type,mr.pr_public, c.lc_index,c.lc_title,c.lc_type,c.lc_distance,c.lc_run,c.lc_cycle,c.lc_area1,c.lc_area2,c.lc_area3,c.lc_text,c.lc_date,c.lc_good,c.lc_see,c.lc_record, m.lc_xy_arr,m.lc_address from myrecord mr,mycourse mp,course c,map m where mr.mp_index = mp.mp_index and mp.lc_index = c.lc_index and c.lc_index = m.lc_index and mr.pr_index = #{pr_index}
select rownum,pr_index,mp_index,m_index,pr_title,pr_text,pr_see,pr_good,pr_resistdate,pr_recorddate,pr_record,pr_type,pr_public from myrecord where rownum > 0 and pr_public='1'
